filter.1.name: Filter za ruski
filter.1.description: Filter koji omogućuje blokiranje oglasa na ruskim stranicama

filter.2.name: Filter za engleski
filter.2.description: Zasnovan na Easy Listu. Omogućuje blokiranje oglasa za stranice engleskog govornog područja.

filter.4.name: Filter za društvene mreže
filter.4.description: Filtrira widgete društvenih mreža, tipke i slično

filter.5.name: Eksperimentalni filter
filter.5.description: Filter stvoren za ispitivanje opasnih pravila prije nego se dodaju u osnovne filtere

filter.6.name: Filter za njemački
filter.6.description: Filter koji omogućuje blokiranje oglasa na njemačkim stranicama

filter.7.name: Filter za japanski
filter.7.description: Filter koji omogućuje blokiranje oglasa na japanskim stranicama

filter.8.name: Filter za nizozemski
filter.8.description: Filter koji omogućuje blokiranje oglasa na nizozemskim stranicama

filter.9.name: Filter za španjolski i portugalski
filter.9.description: Filter koji omogućuje blokiranje oglasa na španjolskim i portugalskim stranicama

filter.10.name: Filter za korisne oglase
filter.10.description: Filter koji dozvoljava oglase koji bi mogli biti korisni

filter.11.name: Filter za mobilne oglase
filter.11.description: Filter za sve poznate mobilne oglašivačke mreže

filter.12.name: AdGuard Safari filter
filter.12.description: Special filter for Safari 9+ on iOS and Mac OS. We need a separate filter for Safari browser because it does not fully support our rules syntax.

filter.13.name: Filter za turski
filter.13.description: Adguard Turkish filter. Omogućuje blokiranje oglasa na turskim stranicama.

filter.14.name: AdGuard Annoyances filter
filter.14.description: Blocks irritating elements on web pages including cookie notices, third-party widgets and in-page pop-ups.

filter.15.name: AdGuard Simplified domain names filter
filter.15.description: Filter composed from several other filters (AdGuard Base filter, Social Media filter, Tracking Protection filter, Mobile Ads filter, EasyList and EasyPrivacy) and simplified specifically to be better compatible with DNS-level ad blocking.

filter.16.name: AdGuard French filter
filter.16.description: Liste FR + AdGuard French filter. Filter list that specifically removes ads on websites in the French language.
